Borjan: Nadam se da će da se ponovi Liverpul
05 Nov 2019, 10:04 by Nemanja
Golman Crvene zvezde Milan Borjan veruje u sebe i svoje saigrače da mogu ostvariti povoljan rezultat u sutrašnjoj utakmici 4. kola Lige šampiona protiv Totenhema.
Crveno-beli će pred prepunim tribinama stadiona ,,Rajko Mitić“ ugostiti poljuljani Totenhem, koji je ipak u Londonu pokazao silu i zbog čega je šampion Evrope. Ono što ide u korist domaćem timu jeste i eventualno odsustvo Harija Kejna i Hjong Min Sona.
– To je ekipa kao i sve engleske, a jaki su i brzi. Ko god bude na terenu, biće teško, mi ćemo dati sve od sebe – kazao je Borjan za ,,Žurnal“.
Jedan od najboljih igrača kluba godinama unazad smatra da je potrebno da ekipa da sve od sebe i da će navijači to prepoznati.
– Zvezdaška javnost je specifična, mnogo traži od nas. Razume se, i trebalo bi da bude tako, jer smo veliki klub. Prepozna se kad ostavimo srce na terenu, podrže nas. Nadam se da ćemo u sredu da damo sve od sebe i obradujemo navijače – istakao je Borjan.
Ono što bi, prema rečima Zvezdinog čuvara mreže, trebalo da bude ključ uspeha na terenu, jeste dogovor iz svlačionice.
– Moramo da slušamo stručni štab, rade izuzetnu analizu. Sve zavisi od toga kako uđemo u utakmicu. Imamo 12. igrača, navijače, nadam se da će da bude pun stadion. Ako slušamo stručni štab biće sve dobro, a ako krenemo da radimo po našem ulazimo u probleme. Tako je bilo u Londonu, nismo slušali šta je bio plan – otkrio je Borjan.
Zvezda je u prethodnim sezonama pokazala da može da se nameće sa velikanima, posebno na domaćem terenu.
– U poslednje tri godine smo napravili izvanrednu priču, jednom igrali Ligu Evrope i dva puta Ligu šampiona. Neverovatno je lepo šta se dešava. Dolazi teška utakmica, probaćemo da napravimo dobar rezultat i prođemo grupnu fazu.
Datum 6. novembar odmah se vezuje za pobedu nad Liverpulom u zvezdaškoj javnosti, a istog dana, samo godinu dana kasnije, na ,,Rajko Mitić“ stiže Totenhem.
– Lepa su sećanja, ali lopta je okrugla. Nadam se da će da se ponovi Liverpul, da upišemo nova tri boda. Značilo bi svima u klubu, navijačima – rekao je Borjan.
Meč je na programu sutra od 21 sat.

Borjan: I hope it happens again in Liverpool
05 Nov 2019, 10:04 by Nemanja
Red Star goalkeeper Milan Borjan believes in himself and his teammates that they can achieve a favorable result in tomorrow's Game 4 of the Champions League against Tottenham.
In front of the packed stadiums of the Rajko Mitic Stadium, the Red and White will host a shabby Tottenham, who has shown strength in London and is a European champion. What also benefits the home team is the possible absence of Harry Kane and Hyung Min Son.
- It's a team like all English, and they're strong and fast. Whoever is on the field will be difficult, we will do our best - Borjan told the Journal.
One of the best players in the club thinks back in the years that the team needs to do their best and fans will recognize it.
- The star public is specific, it asks us a lot. Of course, and it should be, because we're a big club. It recognizes when we leave our hearts in the field, they support us. I hope that on Wednesday we will do our best and cheer the fans on - said Borjan.
What should be the key to success on the field, according to the star's keeper of the net, is the locker room deal.
- We have to listen to the expert staff, they do an exceptional analysis. It all depends on how we get into the match. We have 12 players, fans, hopefully a full stadium. If we listen to the headquarters, everything will be fine, and if we go to work on our own we will get into trouble. That's how it was in London, we didn't listen to what the plan was - Borjan revealed.
The star has shown in previous seasons that he can impose himself with the Giants, especially on home turf.
- In the last three years we have made a remarkable story, once playing the Europa League and twice the Champions League. It's incredibly beautiful what's going on. A tough game is coming, we will try to make a good result and go through the group stage.
The date of November 6th is immediately tied to the victory over Liverpool in the starry public, and on the same day, just one year later, Tottenham arrives at Rajko Mitic.
- Nice memories, but the ball is round. Hopefully it will happen again in Liverpool, to get another three points. It would mean everyone in the club, the fans - said Borjan.
The match is on the program tomorrow from 9 pm.
